name: Beer Pong Arcade
description:
Controls:

Keyboard:

Hold space and release to throw the ball.

Press escape or click on the coin slot to open the menus.

WASD / Arrow keys to move ball.

Controller:

Hold and release A on an Xbox controller or X on a PlayStation controller to throw the ball.

Press start to open the menus.

Joysticks or D-Pad to move ball.
